mapper.select: select certificationid,nationality,realname,idcard,status,message,DATE_FORMAT(createtime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as createtime from c_t_app_certification where userid = #{userid} and delflag = 0 order by createtime desc limit 1

select userid,nickname,headimage,sum(parentprofit) as sumprofit from ( select us.userid,us.nickname,us.headimage,IFNULL(te.parentprofit,0) as parentprofit from c_t_app_userinfo us left join c_t_app_teamprofit te on te.userid = us.userid where us.parentid = #{userid} ) A group by userid,nickname,headimage order by A.parentprofit desc

select (select IFNULL(sum(cardprice),0) from c_t_app_order where buyuserid =#{userid} and status > 1) as allorder, (select IFNULL(sum(cardprice), 0) from c_t_app_order where buyuserid = #{userid} and status in (2, 3)) as buyorder, (select IFNULL(sum(cardprice), 0) from c_t_app_order where selluserid = #{userid} and status in (0, 1)) as sellorder, sumassets,sumprofit from c_t_app_userinfo us where userid = #{userid}
